name: Pelago
headline: The world's first digital clinic for substance use management
description: Pelago, formerly Quit Genius, is the world’s leading virtual clinic for substance use management. We are transforming substance use support—from prevention to treatment—delivering education, management skills, and opportunities for positive change to members struggling with substance use, most commonly tobacco, alcohol, or opioids. Our solution gives employers the means to offer on-demand, personalized support to workers seeking to live healthier lives. Pelago’s cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and medication-assisted treatment (MAT) programs deliver convenient, accessible, and effective support that seamlessly integrates with health plans, pharmacy benefit managers, and wellness platforms. To date, Pelago has helped more than 750,000 members manage their substance use and improve their lives.

founders.name: Yusuf Sherwani, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Co-founder and CEO at Pelago. Medical Doctor.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Pelago**

**Name:** Pelago (formerly Quit Genius)  
**Founded:** 2017  
**Location:** New York, NY  
**Team Size:** 180 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator W18  

**Mission:** Pelago aims to be the world’s first digital clinic dedicated to managing substance use disorders (SUD) by providing comprehensive support for prevention, treatment, and recovery.

Pelago began its journey as a groundbreaking virtual clinic designed to tackle substance use management. It has positioned itself at the forefront of a much-needed health initiative, supporting individuals struggling with addictions to tobacco, alcohol, opioids, and cannabis. Their approach encompasses personalized interventions which blend cognitive behavioral therapy (CBT) and medication-assisted treatment (MAT). This helps members develop the skills and knowledge necessary to navigate their journey towards healthier living.

**Key Features & Offerings:**
- **Personalized Care:** Each member of Pelago receives customized treatment plans based on their health profile and goals.
- **Integrated Solutions:** Pelago seamlessly collaborates with health plans, pharmacy benefit managers, and wellness programs, making care accessible anytime and anywhere.
- **Proven Outcomes:** The clinic has successfully assisted over 750,000 individuals, achieving significant reductions in substance use. For example, members report a 62% decrease in alcohol use within the first 30 days and a 67% abstinence rate from opioids after 90 days.
- **Remote Support:** With a team composed of physicians, nurses, coaches, and counselors, Pelago provides round-the-clock support through its virtual platform. They also use innovative tools for ongoing monitoring, like breathalyzers and urine test kits, to help motivate members.

**Benefit for Employers:**
Pelago empowers businesses to enhance employee wellness and productivity while reducing healthcare costs associated with substance use disorders. By offering this vital service, employers not only support their workforce but also contribute to a healthier organizational environment.

**Current Focus:**
- Introducing new product enhancements and updates as part of their Winter 2025 Release.
- Enhancing their resource library to provide even greater support for users.

Whether you’re an employer looking to improve workplace health or an individual seeking help, Pelago presents a digital solution that bridges the gap in substance use management, providing effective, stigma-free support. 

For more information, visit their website: [Pelago Health](https://www.pelagohealth.com).
